articles.author: Oliver Harden
articles.title: Max Verstappen doubts Saudi-like recovery possible for Sergio Perez in Melbourne - Planet F1
articles.description: Max Verstappen believes Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez will find it tough to carve through the field at the Australian Grand Prix.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen has cast doubt on Red Bull team-mate Sergio Perez’s ability to recover through the field from a poor grid position at the Australian Grand Prix.
Having struggled throughout the final … [+3557 chars]
